items.title: 1. Welcome to the Report Editor
items.content: You can review and edit individual reports here.

items.title: 2. Report actions
items.content: Use these buttons to submit, review and preview reports.

items.title: 3. Table of contents
items.content: Easily navigate to different sections of the report from here.

items.title: 4. Report Viewer
items.content: View and edit the report in this panel.
